body:
Hey guys, It's baz here and I just wanted to bring up how about 10ish minutes ago I was banned on Avicus for hacking... Here is the only proof I managed to gather that I was not hacking (because I was not recording at the time I was playing) and I really hope this is enough evidence to get me unbanned? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etF_IVWsiKg&feature=youtu.be
Furthermore, I have no reason to hack as I am 1 lvl away from approaching prestige 3 on nebula and I have Gold rank, so there is really no reason why I would want to hack? Also, Avicus Is the server I dedicate most of my time to and have spent a very long time playing. So if for some reason I did want to hack, Avicus would by far not be a server I would do it on.  I would really appreciate if someone could get back to me because I'm starting to get worried I might get banned forever :( without me doing anything wrong.. Thanks for reading ~Bazookalokigh

title: I was banned for forcefield? Help! :(

replies.body: Please write an appeal at support@avicus.net, the forums is not a place for ban appeals.
replies.body_tagged: Please write an appeal at support@avicus.net, the forums is not a place for ban appeals.

replies.body: Thanks, Sorry I didn't know where to post :(
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, Sorry I didn't know where to post :(

replies.body: Might I just ask, what is that at 0:06?
